channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Target Point for El Debate, 22 July 2024 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Partido Socialista Obrero Español (S&D): 19–24 seats
  • Podemos (GUE/NGL): 2–4 seats
  • Se Acabó La Fiesta (NI): 1–4 seats
  • Movimiento Sumar–Catalunya en Comú–Més–Compromís–Más País–Chunta (Greens/EFA): 1–3 seats
  • Movimiento Sumar–Izquierda Unida (GUE/NGL): 0–2 seats
  • Vox (PfE): 6–9 seats
  • Partido Popular (EPP): 21–26 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Target Point for El Debate, 22 July 2024 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
item.description: TBD

item.title: Opinion Poll by Target Point for El Debate, 22 July 2024 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Socialista Obrero Español (S&D): 27.3–34.4%
  • Podemos (GUE/NGL): 3.4–6.8%
  • Se Acabó La Fiesta (NI): 2.8–5.9%
  • Movimiento Sumar–Catalunya en Comú–Més–Compromís–Más País–Chunta (Greens/EFA): 2.4–5.3%
  • Movimiento Sumar–Izquierda Unida (GUE/NGL): 1.3–3.6%
  • Vox (PfE): 8.6–13.4%
  • Partido Popular (EPP): 30.4–37.8%
